ðŸ“– Summary: RisingWave is a real-time event streaming platform that offers a simple and cost-effective way to process, analyze, and manage real-time event data. It features PostgreSQL compatibility, S3 storage, and Apache Iceberg integration. RisingWave supports both SQL and Python interfaces for interacting with streaming data.
